item.title: GCP PCA --- practice exam
item.author: celine
item.description: 2023-08-04 Google Cloud Platform - Professional Cloud Architect GET! VPC firewall rules Security policy overview Control communication between Pods and Services using network policies Identity-Aware Proxy overview Optimize application latency with load balancing Kubernetes Services Ingress for internal Application Load Balancers Connecting to Google Cloud: your networking options explained Carrier Peering — Considerations Partner Interconnect overview Dedicated Interconnect overview Overview of VPC Service Controls Access control lists Overview of IAP for on-premises apps
